oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Genuine know-how from Juva" - a label for local products that has made a difference
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kakriainen, Salla
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Markets and trade
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The local label from Juva is a positive example of self-organised cooperation around a clear need. All parties had a genuine interest in establishing the label. For farmers, processors and shopkeepers it meant help in marketing; for organisations and the municipality, PR and promoting the welfare in the region.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Kakriainen, Salla (2005) "Genuine know-how from Juva" - a label for local products that has made a difference. In: Kakriainen, Salla and von Essen, Hans (Eds.) Obstacles and solutions in use of local and organic food. Ekologiskt lantbruk, no. 44. Sveriges lantbruksuniversitet, Centrum för uthålligt lantbruk, pp. 56-60.
